name: REGAL RETAIL
description:
REGALE RETAIL:

You and Johnny are the only ones to come into work after a major storm, and there's bound to be another storm of customers flooding the store. Can you handle the onslaught or will you get fired in the process?

Controls:

Movement - WSAD

Interact - Spacebar

Pause - Escape

Credits:

Programming, Sounds, and Game Design - Michael A. Percy

Scene, Character & Game Design - Vincent Santos

Item Art - Redgrave

Poster and Banner Art - hotcoco7946

hotcoco7946 Deviant Art

hotcoco7946 Twitter

Music - Clebanoff And His Orchestra, Strings Afire
